content.html:
this seems to fix inserting a PR2 from the gui (requires that sdf PR):

diff -r a72fc496e195 gazebo/gui/ModelMaker.cc
--- a/gazebo/gui/ModelMaker.cc  Tue Jan 14 14:10:54 2020 -0600
+++ b/gazebo/gui/ModelMaker.cc  Wed Jan 15 10:56:18 2020 -0800
@@ -111,7 +111,8 @@
   this->dataPtr->modelSDF.reset(new sdf::SDF);
   sdf::initFile("root.sdf", this->dataPtr->modelSDF);

-  if (!sdf::readFile(_filename, this->dataPtr->modelSDF))
+  sdf::Errors errors;
+  if (!sdf::readFile(_filename, this->dataPtr->modelSDF, false, errors))
   {
     gzerr << "Unable to load file[" << _filename << "]\n";
     return false;
